Properties.ProtectedString:
local bigCount = 0
local Tool = script.Parent local sword = script.Parent.Handle
local waitTime = 0.05 local maxDamage = 7 local damage = 0
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local maxNumClones = 6 local numClones = maxNumClones
Tool.Enabled = true equipped = false
local mySwords = {} local iceblox = {} local swordConnections = {}
for i = 1, numClones do local newSword = Tool.Handle:Clone() newSword.Transparency = (numClones-i+1)/(numClones+1) --newSword.Mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new((i+numClones)/(2*numClones+1), (i+numClones)/(2*numClones+1), 1) newSword.Mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new((i+numClones)/(2*numClones+1), (i+2*numClones)/(3*numClones+1), 1) newSword.Anchored = false newSword.CanCollide = false swordConn = newSword.Touched:connect(function (hit) blow(hit, 1-newSword.Transparency) end) table.insert(swordConnections, swordConn)
local newBodyPos = Instance.new("BodyPosition") newBodyPos.Name = "SwordPos" newBodyPos.P = 10000 newBodyPos.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBodyPos.P, newBodyPos.P, newBodyPos.P) newBodyPos.Parent = newSword
local newBodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") newBodyGyro.Name = "SwordGyro" newBodyGyro.P = 10000 newBodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(newBodyGyro.P, newBodyGyro.P, newBodyGyro.P) newBodyGyro.Parent = newSword
table.insert(mySwords, newSword) end
function blow(hit, swordOpacity) if swordOpacity == nil then swordOpacity = 0 end if hit == nil then return end if hit.Parent == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil or vCharacter.Name == "Backpack" then return end --local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local hum = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") -- non-nil if tool held by a character if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= hum and hum ~= nil then local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) -- final check, make sure sword is in-hand local right_arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("RightHand") if (right_arm ~= nil) then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == sword or joint.Part1 == sword)) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) --humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage*swordOpacity) wait(1) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
--function blow(hit, swordOpacity) -- if swordOpacity ~= nil and swordOpacity < 1 and swordOpacity > 0 then -- print(bigCount) -- bigCount = bigCount + 1 --[[ if swordOpacity == nil then swordOpacity = 0 end if swordOpacity < 1 and swordOpacity > 0 then print("A1") end if hit == nil then return end if hit.Parent == nil then return end if swordOpacity < 1 and swordOpacity > 0 then print("A2") end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil or vCharacter.Name == "Backpack" then return end if swordOpacity < 1 and swordOpacity > 0 then print("A3") end --local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local hum = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") -- non-nil if tool held by a character if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= hum and hum ~= nil then local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) -- final check, make sure sword is in-hand if swordOpacity < 1 and swordOpacity > 0 then print("B") end local right_arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if (right_arm ~= nil) then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == sword or joint.Part1 == sword)) then if swordOpacity < 1 and swordOpacity > 0 then print("C") end tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) --humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) if swordOpacity < 1 and swordOpacity > 0 then print("YAYYY!") end if swordOpacity < 1 then humanoid:TakeDamage(damage*swordOpacity) end wait(1) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end
end --]] -- end --end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = player creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = humanoid end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
local canEquip = true function onEquipped() if not canEquip then return end canEquip = false Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1
Tool.Handle.DrinkSound:Play()
local snowStars = {}
for k = 1, 5 do local snowStar = Tool.Snowstar:Clone() snowStar.Anchored = false snowStar.CFrame = Tool.Handle.CFrame snowStar.Transparency = 0
--local starWeld = Instance.new("Weld") --starWeld.Part0 = snowStar --starWeld.Part1 = Tool.Handle --starWeld.C1 = Tool.Handle.CFrame
snowStar.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(math.random(-20,20), math.random(-20,20), math.random(-20, 20)) newBP = Instance.new("BodyPosition") newBP.Name = "StarPos" newBP.P = 10000 newBP.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBP.P, newBP.P, newBP.P) newBP.position = Tool.Handle.Position newBP.Parent = snowStar snowStar.Parent = workspace table.insert(snowStars, snowStar) end
iceblox = {} for i = 1, 20 do local iceblock = Instance.new("Part") iceblock.Size = Vector3.new(.05,.05,.05) iceblock.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Institutional white") iceblock.BottomSurface = "Smooth" iceblock.TopSurface = "Smooth" iceblock.Material = "Concrete"
local iceweld = Instance.new("Weld") iceweld.Part0 = iceblock iceweld.Part1 = Tool.Handle iceweld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(math.random()*math.pi, math.random()*math.pi, math.random()*math.pi) + Vector3.new(0, 0, 1.8-i*.2) iceweld.Parent = iceblock
iceblock.Parent = Tool table.insert(iceblox, iceblock)
--snowStar.StarPos.position = Tool.Handle.Position + Vector3.new(3,0,0)*math.sin(i*3*math.pi/10) + Vector3.new(0,0,3)*math.cos(i*3*math.pi/10) for k = 1, #snowStars do snowStars[k].StarPos.position = Tool.Handle.Position + Vector3.new(3,0,0)*math.sin(i*3*math.pi/10+k*.5) + Vector3.new(0, i*.15-1.2, 0) + Vector3.new(0,0,3)*math.cos(i*3*math.pi/10+k*.5) end
wait(.1) end
for k = 1, #snowStars do snowStars[k]:Destroy() end
wait(1)
if #iceblox > 1 and iceblox[1].Transparency < 1 and iceblox[#iceblox].Transparency < 1 then equipped = true damage = maxDamage end for i = 1, #iceblox, 2 do local count = 5
if equipped then
if i == 1 then Tool.Handle.ExplodeSound:Play() end
for i=1,count do local p = Instance.new("Part") p.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("White") p.formFactor = 2 p.Size = Vector3.new(1,.4,1) --p.Material = Enum.Material.Ice p.Material = "Concrete" p.TopSurface = 0 p.BottomSurface = 0 p.CanCollide = false
--p.Velocity = iceblox[i].Velocity * (4 + (math.random() *2)) --p.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(math.random(-20,20), math.random(-20,20), math.random(-20,20)) --p.Position = iceblox[i].Position + (iceblox[i].Velocity * math.random() * .05) + Vector3.new(0,math.random() * 3, 0) p.Velocity = iceblox[i].Velocity * math.random() + Vector3.new(50*(math.random()-.5), math.random()*20, 50*(math.random()-.5)) p.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(math.random(-5,5), math.random(-5,5), math.random(-5,5)) p.Position = iceblox[i].Position + (iceblox[i].Velocity * math.random() * .05) + Vector3.new(0,math.random(), 0) p.Parent = workspace
debris:AddItem(p, 10) end end
iceblox[i]:Destroy() if i+1 <= #iceblox then iceblox[i+1]:Destroy() end
end
Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0 canEquip = true end
function onUnequipped() Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1
damage = 0
numClones = maxNumClones
for i = 1, #iceblox do if iceblox[i] ~= nil and iceblox[i].Parent ~= nil then iceblox[i].Transparency = 1 end end
for i = 1, #mySwords do --mySwords[i].Parent = nil mySwords[i].Parent = game.Lighting end
equipped = false end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled or not equipped then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
--Tool.Handle.DrinkSound:Play()
--wait(1)
for k = 1, #swordConnections do swordConnections[k]:disconnect() swordConnections[k] = mySwords[k].Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(hit, 1-mySwords[k].Transparency) end) end
-- use a ring array, for efficiency, so need a counter to keep track of current index local index = 1
-- start out at current sword's CFrame local swordFrames = {} for i = 1, numClones do table.insert(swordFrames, Tool.Handle.CFrame) mySwords[i].CFrame = Tool.Handle.CFrame --mySwords[i].Parent = workspace mySwords[i].Parent = Tool.Parent end
local numSteps = 5 / waitTime for i = 1, numSteps do -- 5 seconds of sword ghosting/strobing for j = 1, numClones do --mySwords[j].CFrame = swordFrames[index] if swordFrames[index] ~= nil then mySwords[j].SwordGyro.cframe = swordFrames[index] mySwords[j].SwordPos.position = swordFrames[index].p end index = index + 1 if index > numClones then index = 1 end end swordFrames[index] = Tool.Handle.CFrame index = index + 1 if index > numClones then index = 1 end wait(waitTime)
end
for i = 1, numClones do mySwords[i].Parent = game.Lighting end
if numClones > 0 then numClones = numClones - 1 end
wait(5)
Tool.Enabled = true
end
sword.Touched:connect(function (hit) blow(hit, 1) end)
script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)

local Tool = script.Parent local anim = nil local swoosh = nil
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowFarCursor.png" --wait(1) if anim ~= nil then anim:Play() end wait(.75) if swoosh ~= nil then swoosh:Play() end wait(.5) if swoosh ~= nil then swoosh:Play() end wait(.25) if anim ~= nil then anim:Stop() end --wait(3.5) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png"
--while not Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end local Humanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if Humanoid then if Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then anim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:WaitForChild("R15xswordfast3")) else anim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:WaitForChild("xswordfast3")) end swoosh = Tool.Handle.Fire mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end end
function onUnequippedLocal() if swoosh ~= nil then swoosh:Stop() end swoosh = nil
if anim ~= nil then anim:Stop() end if anim ~= nil then anim:Destroy() end anim = nil end
Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
